com.rivelbop.rivelworks.preset

Class VehicleMovementPreset

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.preset.VehicleMovementPreset

  • public class VehicleMovementPreset
extends java.lang.Object
    A basic preset for vehicle movement.
    Author:
    David/Philip Jerzak (RivelBop)

    • Field Summary

      private float velocity
      Stores the velocity of the sprite, applied to the translation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VehicleMovementPreset

        public VehicleMovementPreset(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite sprite,
                             float acceleration,
                             float deceleration,
                             float maxSpeed,
                             float rotationSpeed)
        Creates a vehicle from the provided sprite and movement data.
        Parameters:
        sprite - The sprite effected by the vehicle movement.
        acceleration - The acceleration of the sprite.
        deceleration - The deceleration of the sprite.
        maxSpeed - The maximum speed of the sprite.
        rotationSpeed - The rotation speed of the sprite.
